sentences.en: "I want to go with you, Daddy."—"Now, now, sweetheart."
sentences.cn: “爸爸，我想和你一起去。”——“好吧，好吧，小宝贝。”

sentences.en: A New York music teacher is named Love Sweetheart.
sentences.cn: 纽约有一名音乐教师名叫爱?甜心.

sentences.en: Do you think these wedding jitters are making you a little forgetful, sweetheart?
sentences.cn: 这些神经过敏的家伙是不是让你有些健忘了宝贝?

sentences.en: Do you want a drink, sweetheart?
Hank Morgan is heartbroken at the end because he cannot get back to his Arthurian sweetheart.
sentences.cn: 汉克·摩根到了最后悲痛欲绝,因为他无法回到阿瑟王时代爱人的身边.

sentences.en: Hey, sweetheart, call 9 - 1 - 1 . I got a guy here with a gun in my back, huh?
sentences.cn: 嘿亲爱的打电话给911有人用枪顶着我的背?

sentences.en: I bought for my sweetheart a gorgeous diamond.
sentences.cn: 我给自己的恋人买了一颗漂亮的钻石.

sentences.en: I had thought she was also a'sweetheart ".
sentences.cn: 我以为她也只是个 “ 爱人 ”.

sentences.en: I married Shurla, my childhood sweetheart, in Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 我在利物浦和我青梅竹马的恋人舒拉结婚了。
她是约翰儿时的心上人.

sentences.en: She was the author of'sweetheart, " and such she was .
sentences.cn: 她是《心香》的作者, 心香 还能总是板着面孔吗?

sentences.en: Sometimes William, catching a glimpse of his sweetheart's attitude towards his sister, hated her.
sentences.cn: 有时威廉看到心上人这样对待自己的妹妹, 也恨得咬牙切齿.

sentences.en: Well, there goes our little secret, sweetheart.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的, 咱们小小的秘密泄露了.

sentences.en: What can I get you, sweetheart?
sentences.cn: (最常出于女店员或餐馆女侍之口)我能为你拿点什么, 甜心?

words.tran_cn: 爱人,恋人,情人,未婚夫,未婚妻

trans.tran_cn: 私下签订的；私下达成的
